actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 113-27.

official_title: A bill to establish the Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
short_title: Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area Act

summary.text: Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area in Pennsylvania. Designates the Susquehanna Heritage Corporation as the local coordinating entity for the Area. Requires the Corporation to prepare and submit a management plan for the Area.

titles.title: Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish the Susquehanna Gateway National Heritage Area in the State of Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
